Item.Name: KEYBLOC_COAS_CODE
Item.Hint: Chart of Accounts Code; Press LIST for valid codes.

Trigger.Name: POST-CHANGE
Trigger.TriggerText:
BEGIN
 G$_CHECK_QUERY_MODE ;
--
 IF ( :GLOBAL.QUERY_MODE = '1' ) THEN
 GOTO PTI_STEP_001 ;
 END IF ;
 DECLARE
 PTI_INTO_TEMP VARCHAR2(255);
 CURSOR PTI_CURSOR IS
 SELECT 'X'
 FROM FTVCOAS
 WHERE FTVCOAS_COAS_CODE = :KEYBLOC_COAS_CODE ;
 BEGIN
 OPEN PTI_CURSOR ;
 FETCH PTI_CURSOR INTO PTI_INTO_TEMP ;
 G$_CHECK_VALUE (PTI_CURSOR%NOTFOUND,
 G$_NLS.Get('FGIBDSR-0015', 'FORM','Chart of accounts is invalid; LIST is available.') , TRUE);
 END ;
--
 << PTI_STEP_001 >>
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'COPY_FTYP_CODE' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
--
 :GLOBAL.QUERY_MODE := '0' ;
EXCEPTION
 WHEN FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE THEN
 :GLOBAL.QUERY_MODE := '0' ;
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE ;
END ;

Item.Name: KEYBLOC_FSYR_CODE
Item.Hint: Fiscal Year Code; Press LIST for valid codes.

Trigger.Name: POST-CHANGE
Trigger.TriggerText:
BEGIN
 G$_CHECK_QUERY_MODE ;
--
 IF ( :GLOBAL.QUERY_MODE = '1' ) THEN
 GOTO PTI_STEP_001 ;
 END IF ;
 DECLARE
 PTI_INTO_TEMP VARCHAR2(255);
 CURSOR PTI_CURSOR IS
 SELECT 'X'
 FROM FTVFSYR
 WHERE FTVFSYR_COAS_CODE = :KEYBLOC_COAS_CODE
 AND FTVFSYR_FSYR_CODE = :KEYBLOC_FSYR_CODE ;
 BEGIN
 OPEN PTI_CURSOR ;
 FETCH PTI_CURSOR INTO PTI_INTO_TEMP ;
 G$_CHECK_VALUE (PTI_CURSOR%NOTFOUND,
 G$_NLS.Get('FGIBDSR-0016', 'FORM','Fiscal Year is invalid.') , TRUE);
 END ;
--
 DECLARE
 CURSOR PTI_CURSOR IS
 SELECT FTVFSYR_END_DATE
 FROM FTVFSYR
 WHERE FTVFSYR_COAS_CODE = :KEYBLOC_COAS_CODE
 AND FTVFSYR_FSYR_CODE = :KEYBLOC_FSYR_CODE ;
 BEGIN
 OPEN PTI_CURSOR ;
 FETCH PTI_CURSOR INTO :KEYBLOC_SYSDATE;
 CLOSE PTI_CURSOR;
 END;
--
IF :KEYBLOC_ACCI_CODE IS NOT NULL THEN
 DECLARE
 CURSOR PTI_CURSOR IS
 SELECT FTVACCI_FUND_CODE, FTVACCI_FUND_OVERRIDE,
 FTVACCI_ORGN_CODE, FTVACCI_ORGN_OVERRIDE,
 FTVACCI_ACCT_CODE, FTVACCI_ACCT_OVERRIDE,
 FTVACCI_PROG_CODE, FTVACCI_PROG_OVERRIDE,
 FTVACCI_ACTV_CODE, FTVACCI_ACTV_OVERRIDE,
 FTVACCI_LOCN_CODE, FTVACCI_LOCN_OVERRIDE,
 '', '', '', '', '', '', ''
 FROM FTVACCI
 WHERE FTVACCI_COAS_CODE = :KEYBLOC_COAS_CODE
 AND FTVACCI_ACCI_CODE = :KEYBLOC_ACCI_CODE
 AND ftvacci_eff_date <= :KEYBLOC_SYSDATE
 AND ftvacci_nchg_date > :KEYBLOC_SYSDATE ;
 BEGIN
 OPEN PTI_CURSOR ;
 FETCH PTI_CURSOR INTO :KEYbloc_FUND_CODE,
 :FUND_OVERRIDE, :KEYbloc_ORGN_CODE, :ORGN_OVERRIDE,
 :KEYbloc_ACCT_CODE, :ACCT_OVERRIDE,
 :KEYbloc_PROG_CODE, :PROG_OVERRIDE,
 :KEYbloc_ACTV_CODE, :ACTV_OVERRIDE,
 :KEYbloc_LOCN_CODE, :LOCN_OVERRIDE,
 :key_fund_desc, :key_orgn_desc,
 :key_acct_desc, :key_prog_desc, 
 :key_actv_desc, :key_locn_desc, :key_atyp_desc ;
 G$_CHECK_VALUE (PTI_CURSOR%NOTFOUND,
'Account Index is invalid; LIST is available.', TRUE);
 END ;
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'FOPAL_ENTER_ON_OFF');
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'FILL_DESC');

END IF;
 << PTI_STEP_001 >>
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'COPY_FTYP_CODE' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
--
 :GLOBAL.QUERY_MODE := '0' ;
EXCEPTION
 WHEN FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE THEN
 :GLOBAL.QUERY_MODE := '0' ;
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE ;
END ;

Item.Name: KEYBLOC_ORGN_CODE
Item.Hint: Organization Code; Press LIST for valid codes.

Trigger.Name: POST-CHANGE
Trigger.TriggerText:
BEGIN
 
--
 DECLARE
 CURSOR PTI_CURSOR IS
 SELECT FTVORGN_TITLE, FTVORGN_FUND_CODE_DEF
 FROM FTVORGN
 WHERE FTVORGN_COAS_CODE = :KEYBLOC_COAS_CODE
 AND FTVORGN_ORGN_CODE = :KEYBLOC_ORGN_CODE
 AND FTVORGN_EFF_DATE <= :KEYBLOC_SYSDATE
 AND FTVORGN_NCHG_DATE > :KEYBLOC_SYSDATE ;
 BEGIN
 OPEN PTI_CURSOR ;
 FETCH PTI_CURSOR INTO :KEY_ORGN_DESC, :ORGN_FUND_DEF ;
 G$_CHECK_VALUE (PTI_CURSOR%NOTFOUND,
 G$_NLS.Get('FGIBDSR-0018', 'FORM','Organization is invalid; LIST is available.') 
 , TRUE);
 END ;
--
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'CHECK_ORGN_SECURITY' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
--
 IF :KEYBLOC_fund_code IS NULL THEN
 :KEYBLOC_FUND_CODE := '' ;
 END IF ;
--
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'COPY_FTYP_CODE' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
--
 end;

Trigger.Name: NO_ORGN_OVERRIDE
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :KEYBLOC_ORGN_CODE = :KEYHOLD_ORGN_CODE OR (
 :KEYBLOC_ORGN_CODE IS NULL AND :KEYHOLD_ORGN_CODE IS
 NULL ) THEN
 RETURN ;
 END IF ;
 :KEYBLOC_ORGN_CODE := :KEYHOLD_ORGN_CODE ;
 MESSAGE(
 G$_NLS.Get('FGIBDSR-0019', 'FORM','Cannot override Organization for this Account Index.') 
 ) ;
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE ;

Trigger.Name: CHECK_QUERY_REV_ACCT
Trigger.TriggerText:
if :QUERY_ACCT = 'S' THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('INCL_REV',ENABLED,PROPERTY_OFF);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('INCL_REV',NAVIGABLE,PROPERTY_OFF);
END IF;

if :INCL_REV = 'Y' THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('QUERY_ACCT',ENABLED,PROPERTY_OFF);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('QUERY_ACCT',NAVIGABLE,PROPERTY_OFF);
END IF;

IF :INCL_REV = 'N' THEN
 IF GET_ITEM_PROPERTY('QUERY_ACCT',ENABLED) = 'FALSE' THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('QUERY_ACCT',ENABLED,PROPERTY_ON);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('QUERY_ACCT',NAVIGABLE,PROPERTY_ON);
 END IF;
END IF;

IF :QUERY_ACCT = 'R' THEN
 IF GET_ITEM_PROPERTY('INCL_REV',ENABLED) = 'FALSE' THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('INCL_REV',ENABLED,PROPERTY_ON);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('INCL_REV',NAVIGABLE,PROPERTY_ON);
 END IF;
END IF;

Trigger.Name: GET_FUND_DEFS
Trigger.TriggerText:
--
 << SEL_FUND_DEFS >>
 DECLARE
 CURSOR PTI_CURSOR IS
 SELECT FTVFUND_ORGN_CODE_DEF, FTVFUND_PROG_CODE_DEF,
 FTVFUND_ACTV_CODE_DEF, FTVFUND_LOCN_CODE_DEF
 FROM FTVFUND
 WHERE FTVFUND_COAS_CODE = :keybloc_COAS_CODE
 AND FTVFUND_FUND_CODE = :keybloc_FUND_CODE
 AND FTVFUND_EFF_DATE <= :KEYBLOC_SYSDATE
 AND (FTVFUND_NCHG_DATE > :KEYBLOC_SYSDATE) ;
 BEGIN
 OPEN PTI_CURSOR ;
 FETCH PTI_CURSOR INTO :FUND_ORGN_DEF, :FUND_PROG_DEF,
 :FUND_ACTV_DEF, :FUND_LOCN_DEF ;
 G$_CHECK_VALUE (PTI_CURSOR%NOTFOUND, NULL, TRUE);
 END ;
--
 IF :keybloc_ORGN_CODE IS NULL THEN
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'COPY_FUND_ORGN_DEF' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 END IF ;
--
 IF :keybloc_PROG_CODE IS NULL THEN
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'COPY_FUND_PROG_DEF' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 END IF ;
--
 IF :keybloc_ACTV_CODE IS NULL THEN
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'COPY_FUND_ACTV_DEF' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 END IF ;
--
 IF :keybloc_LOCN_CODE IS NULL THEN
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'COPY_FUND_LOCN_DEF' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 END IF ;
--
 << ET >>
 NULL ;

 IF :KEYBLOC_atyp_CODE IS NOT NULL THEN
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'INSERT_atyp_HIER' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 END IF ;

Block.Name: FTVACCT_BLOCK
Block.WhereClause: where ftvacct_coas_code = :keybloc_coas_code and (((:query_acct = 'S' and ftvacct_acct_code = :keybloc_acct_code) or (:query_acct = 'R' and ftvacct_acct_code between nvl(:keybloc_acct_code, chr(0)) and chr(255) or exists (select 'X' from fgrathc where fgrathc_sess_id = userenv('SESSIONID') and fgrathc_acct_code = ftvacct_acct_code ))) and (ftvacct_eff_date <= :keybloc_sysdate and ftvacct_nchg_date > :keybloc_sysdate)) and exists (select 'X' from fgbopal where fgbopal_fsyr_code = :keybloc_fsyr_code and fgbopal_coas_code = :keybloc_coas_code and fgbopal_acct_code = ftvacct_acct_code and fgbopal_cmt_type = nvl(:cmt_type,fgbopal_cmt_type) and (fgbopal_fund_code between nvl(:keybloc_fund_code, chr (0)) and nvl(:keybloc_fund_code, chr (255)) or exists (select 'X' from fgrfdhc where fgrfdhc_sess_id = userenv('SESSIONID') and fgrfdhc_fund_code = fgbopal_fund_code)) and (fgbopal_orgn_code between nvl(:keybloc_orgn_code, chr(0 )) and nvl(:keybloc_orgn_code, chr (255)) or exists (select 'X' from fgrorhc where fgrorhc_sess_id = userenv('SESSIONID') and fgrorhc_orgn_code = fgbopal_orgn_code)) and (fgbopal_prog_code between nvl(:keybloc_prog_code, chr(0 )) and nvl(:keybloc_prog_code, chr (255)) or exists (select 'X' from fgrpghc where fgrpghc_sess_id = userenv('SESSIONID') and fgrpghc_prog_code = fgbopal_prog_code)) and fgbopal_actv_code between nvl(:keybloc_actv_code, chr(0) ) and nvl(:keybloc_actv_code, chr (255)) and (fgbopal_locn_code between nvl(:keybloc_locn_code, chr(0 )) and nvl(:keybloc_locn_code, chr (255)) or exists (select 'X' from fgrlohc where fgrlohc_sess_id = userenv('SESSIONID') and fgrlohc_locn_code = fgbopal_locn_code)))

Item.Hint: Press Duplicate Item to view Transaction Detail activity.

Item.Hint: Press Duplicate Item to view Transaction Detail activity.

Item.Name: DISPLAY_SUM_RSVR
Item.Hint: Press Duplicate Item to view Transaction Detail activity.

Trigger.Name: POST-QUERY
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 CURSOR PTI_CURSOR IS
 SELECT SUM(FGBOPAL_14_ADOPT_BUD + FGBOPAL_14_BUD_ADJT),
 SUM(FGBOPAL_14_YTD_ACTV), SUM(FGBOPAL_14_ENCUMB +
 FGBOPAL_14_BUD_RSRV), SUM(FGBOPAL_14_ADOPT_BUD +
 FGBOPAL_14_BUD_ADJT) - SUM(FGBOPAL_14_YTD_ACTV +
 FGBOPAL_14_ENCUMB + FGBOPAL_14_BUD_RSRV)
 FROM FGBOPAL a
 WHERE a.FGBOPAL_FSYR_CODE = :KEYBLOC_FSYR_CODE
 AND a.FGBOPAL_COAS_CODE = :KEYBLOC_COAS_CODE
 AND a.FGBOPAL_ACCT_CODE = :FTVACCT_ACCT_CODE
 AND a.FGBOPAL_CMT_TYPE = NVL(:CMT_TYPE,
 a.FGBOPAL_CMT_TYPE)
 AND (a.fgbopal_fund_code BETWEEN NVL(
 :KEYBLOC_FUND_CODE, CHR(0)) AND NVL(
 :KEYBLOC_FUND_CODE, CHR(255))
 OR EXISTS (
 SELECT 'X'
 FROM FGRFDHC
 WHERE FGRFDHC_SESS_ID = USERENV('SESSIONID')
 AND FGRFDHC_FUND_CODE = a.FGBOPAL_FUND_CODE )
 )
 AND (a.fgbopal_orgn_code BETWEEN NVL(
 :KEYBLOC_ORGN_CODE, CHR(0)) AND NVL(
 :KEYBLOC_ORGN_CODE, CHR(255))
 OR EXISTS (
 SELECT 'X'
 FROM FGRORHC
 WHERE FGRORHC_SESS_ID = USERENV('SESSIONID')
 AND FGRORHC_ORGN_CODE = a.FGBOPAL_ORGN_CODE )
 )
 AND (a.fgbopal_prog_code BETWEEN NVL(
 :KEYBLOC_PROG_CODE, CHR(0)) AND NVL(
 :KEYBLOC_PROG_CODE, CHR(255))
 OR EXISTS (
 SELECT 'X'
 FROM FGRPGHC
 WHERE FGRPGHC_SESS_ID = USERENV('SESSIONID')
 AND FGRPGHC_PROG_CODE = a.FGBOPAL_PROG_CODE )
 )
 AND a.fgbopal_actv_code BETWEEN NVL(
 :KEYBLOC_actv_CODE, CHR(0)) AND NVL(
 :KEYBLOC_actv_CODE, CHR(255))
 AND (a.fgbopal_locn_code BETWEEN NVL(
 :KEYBLOC_locn_CODE, CHR(0)) AND NVL(
 :KEYBLOC_locn_CODE, CHR(255))
 OR EXISTS (
 SELECT 'X'
 FROM FGRLOHC
 WHERE FGRLOHC_SESS_ID = USERENV('SESSIONID')
 AND FGRLOHC_LOCN_CODE = a.FGBOPAL_LOCN_CODE )
 ) ;
 cursor int_atyp is
 select ftvatyp_internal_atyp_code
 FROM ftvatyp
 WHERE FTVATYP_COAS_CODE = :KEYBLOC_COAS_CODE
 AND ftvatyp_atyp_code = :ftvacct_atyp_code
 AND FTVATYP_EFF_DATE <= :KEYBLOC_SYSDATE
 AND FTVATYP_NCHG_DATE > :KEYBLOC_SYSDATE;

 BEGIN
IF :KEY_BLOCK.INCL_REV = 'Y' THEN /* 1-2IN90H */

 OPEN PTI_CURSOR ;
 FETCH PTI_CURSOR INTO :DISPLAY_SUM_ADJT,
 :DISPLAY_SUM_YTD_ACTV, :DISPLAY_SUM_RSVR,
 :DISPLAY_AVAIL_BAL ;
 
 open int_atyp;
 fetch int_atyp into :internal_atyp_code;
 if :internal_atyp_code = '50' then
 :itype_desc := 'R';
 elsif :internal_atyp_code = '60' then
 :itype_desc := 'L';
 elsif :internal_atyp_code = '70' then
 :itype_desc := 'E';
 elsif :internal_atyp_code = '80' then
 :itype_desc := 'T';
 end if;
 if :query_acct = 'R' then
 IF (:internal_atyp_code = '50') THEN
 :NET_SUM_ADJT := (NVL(:DISPLAY_SUM_ADJT, 0) + NVL(:NET_SUM_ADJT, 0)) ;
 :NET_SUM_YTD_ACTV := (NVL(:DISPLAY_SUM_YTD_ACTV, 0) + NVL(:NET_SUM_YTD_ACTV, 0)) ;
 END IF ;
 --
 IF (:internal_atyp_code IN ('60', '70', '80')) THEN
 :NET_SUM_ADJT := (NVL(:NET_SUM_ADJT, 0) - NVL(:DISPLAY_SUM_ADJT, 0)) ;
 :NET_SUM_YTD_ACTV := (NVL(:NET_SUM_YTD_ACTV, 0) - NVL(:DISPLAY_SUM_YTD_ACTV, 0)) ;
 :NET_SUM_RSRV := (NVL(:NET_SUM_RSRV, 0) + NVL(:DISPLAY_SUM_RSVR, 0)) ;
 END IF ;
 else
 :NET_SUM_ADJT := (NVL(:NET_SUM_ADJT, 0) + NVL(:DISPLAY_SUM_ADJT, 0)) ;
 :NET_SUM_YTD_ACTV := (NVL(:NET_SUM_YTD_ACTV, 0) + NVL(:DISPLAY_SUM_YTD_ACTV, 0)) ;
 :NET_SUM_RSRV := (NVL(:NET_SUM_RSRV, 0) + NVL(:DISPLAY_SUM_RSVR, 0)) ;
 :net_sum_abal := (NVL(:NET_SUM_abal, 0) + NVL(:DISPLAY_avail_bal, 0)) ; 

end if;
end if;

/*================================================================*/
IF :KEY_BLOCK.INCL_REV = 'N' THEN /* 1-2IN90H */

 open int_atyp;
 fetch int_atyp into :internal_atyp_code;

 if :internal_atyp_code = '50'then 
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 elsif :internal_atyp_code In ( '60','70','80') then

 
 if :internal_atyp_code = '60' then
 :itype_desc := 'L';
 elsif :internal_atyp_code = '70' then
 :itype_desc := 'E';
 elsif :internal_atyp_code = '80' then
 :itype_desc := 'T';
 end if;

 OPEN PTI_CURSOR ;
 FETCH PTI_CURSOR INTO :DISPLAY_SUM_ADJT,
 :DISPLAY_SUM_YTD_ACTV, :DISPLAY_SUM_RSVR,
 :DISPLAY_AVAIL_BAL ;
 
 :NET_SUM_ADJT := (NVL(:NET_SUM_ADJT, 0) + NVL(:DISPLAY_SUM_ADJT, 0)) ;
 :NET_SUM_YTD_ACTV := (NVL(:NET_SUM_YTD_ACTV, 0) + NVL(:DISPLAY_SUM_YTD_ACTV, 0)) ;
 :NET_SUM_RSRV := (NVL(:NET_SUM_RSRV, 0) + NVL(:DISPLAY_SUM_RSVR, 0)) ;
 :net_sum_abal := (NVL(:NET_SUM_abal, 0) + NVL(:DISPLAY_avail_bal, 0)) ;
 end if;

END IF;

 END ;

Trigger.Name: KEY-NXTREC
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :SYSTEM.LAST_RECORD = 'TRUE' THEN
 MESSAGE ( G$_NLS.Get('FGIBDSR-0031', 'FORM','At last record.') ) ;
 ELSE
 NEXT_RECORD ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 END IF ;

Trigger.Name: KEY-DELREC
Trigger.TriggerText: MESSAGE( G$_NLS.Get('FGIBDSR-0032', 'FORM','You cannot remove record here.') );

ProgramUnit.Name: AUDIT_TRAIL_3_0_B2K
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE AUDIT_TRAIL_3_0_B2K IS
/*
AUDIT TRAIL: 3.0 INIT DATE
1. Enhancements for Banner2000 upgrade. These include SQ 01/01/97
 adding an object group which contains the objects for
 the toolbar, adding an object group which highlights
 the active record within a block, a mouse-doubleclick
 and when-timer-expired trigger at the form level and
 this audit trail.
2. Defect#....None
 Signoff....John Lavin 30-MAY-1997
 Problem....Current record highlight for 3.0 Script wrong
 Fix........Change all non-referenced Pre and Post block triggers 
 at the block level from execution style 'override' 
 to 'after'
3. Defect#....6737
 Signoff....Bill Bishop 30-JUN-1997
 Problem....Editor display automatically when entering title column
 Fix........Removed WHEN-NEW-ITEM-INSTANCE trigger.
AUDIT TRAIL END
*/
BEGIN
 NULL;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: AUDIT_TRAIL_3_1
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE AUDIT_TRAIL_3_1 IS
/*
AUDIT TRAIL: 3.1 INIT DATE

1. Defect#....None
 Signoff....SRILAKSHMI BAISETTY 04-NOV-1997
 Problem....FGITRND is defaulting the FUND and PROGRAM from the ORGANIZATION code 
 eventhough did not specify those(FUND& PROGRAM) attributes on FGIBDSR.
 Fix........Modified the trigger POST_CHANGE at item KEYBLOC_ORGN_CODE on FGRFPHC
 block to make it work.
2. Defect#....6152
 Signoff....SESHA KRISTIPATI 17-NOV-1997
 Problem....Account index allows the user to specify whether certain segments of the
 FOPAL defined by that index can be overriden. If the segement is defined
 as not overridable then no form should allow, or even appear to allow other
 values to be associated with that index.

 -If an index is keyed. Defualts are called and FOPAL other than index defaults
 are keyed over index defaults. Query does return data for FOPAL displayed not 
 index default values.

 - Rollback should clear out the FOPAL string.

 - If an index keyed in FOPAL description that corresponds to code 
 should populate the respective description fields.

 - When FOPAL code is 'null' its description should be 'null'.
 
 Fix.........Crearted a from level trigger 'FOPAL_ENTER_ON_OFF' which turns UPDATEABLE and
 INSERT_ALLOWED properties of FOPAL items ON/OFF (ENABLE_KEYS resets these properties).
 This trigger is called in the 'POST_CHANGE' trigger on 'KEYBLOC_ACCI_CODE' item.

 Created WHEN_VALIDATE_ITEM trigger on 'KEYBLOC_ACCI_CODE' item, which populates
 FOPAL description fields. If FOPAL code field is NULL then description is set to NULL. 

 Created a form level trigger 'LOAD_CLEAR_FORM' to clear out FOPAL globals and
 which is called by 'KEY_CLRFRM'. This trigger resets the values of FOPAL fields to
 null upon ROLLBACK.
3.Defect......4569
 Signoff.....Tom Mack 12/2/97
 Problem.....Query Specific Account doesn't work correctly. Retrieves info on numerous
 accounts instead of one.
 Fix.........Removed the line:
 :query_acct := 'R'
 from trigger: 'When-Validate-Item' on item 'Keybloc_atyp_code' in block FGRFPHC
4. Enhancement#....foll
 Signoff....SESHA KRISTIPATI 15-DEC-1997

 Created check box items:
 Item name : QUERY_ACCT; Block name : FGRFPHC.
 Purpose : Check to Query Specific Account, 
 Uncheck to query a range of Accounts.
 
 Item name : INCL_REV; Block name : FGRFPHC.
 Purpose : Check for Including Revenue Accounts.

 Changes made to the Post-query trigger:
 If Include Revenue = 'Y' no changes
 If Include Revenue = 'N' then change Post-query trigger 
 add the foll logic 

 if the internal acct type is 50 reject the row ; 
 if the internal acct types are 60,70 , 80 add it to the 
 various columns.

 if include_rev = 'N' then 
 if :internal_atyp_code = '50 '
 then raise form_trigger_failure;
 elsif :internal_atyp_code In ( '60','70','80') then
 
 :NET_SUM_ADJT := (NVL(:NET_SUM_ADJT, 0) + NVL(
 :DISPLAY_SUM_ADJT, 0)) ;
 :NET_SUM_YTD_ACTV := (NVL(:NET_SUM_YTD_ACTV, 0) + NVL(
 :DISPLAY_SUM_YTD_ACTV, 0)) ;
 :NET_SUM_RSRV := (NVL(:NET_SUM_RSRV, 0) + NVL(
 :DISPLAY_SUM_RSVR, 0)) ;
 :net_sum_abal := (NVL(:NET_SUM_abal, 0) + NVL(
 :DISPLAY_avail_bal, 0)) ;
 end if;
 end if;

 Also switched the order of opening the cursors

 Changed :
 OPEN PTI_CURSOR ;
 FETCH PTI_CURSOR INTO :DISPLAY_SUM_ADJT,
 :DISPLAY_SUM_YTD_ACTV, :DISPLAY_SUM_RSVR,
 :DISPLAY_AVAIL_BAL ;
 open int_atyp;
 fetch int_atyp into :internal_atyp_code;

 TO :
 open int_atyp;
 fetch int_atyp into :internal_atyp_code;

 check if 50 and include rev is N then can reject right away.

 OPEN PTI_CURSOR ;
 FETCH PTI_CURSOR INTO :DISPLAY_SUM_ADJT,
 :DISPLAY_SUM_YTD_ACTV, :DISPLAY_SUM_RSVR,
 :DISPLAY_AVAIL_BAL ;


5. Defect#....8445
 Signoff....SESHA KRISTIPATI 25-Jan-1998
 Problem....FGIBDST is not defulting from the fund,
 when the program field is empty at the time the fund 
 is entered.
 Fix........Created block level trigger GET_FUND_DEFS to
 default in values set for a Fund code.
 Block level triggers COPY_FUND_PROG_DEF, COPY_FUND_ORGN_DEF
 COPY_FUND_ACTV_DEF, COPY_FUND_LOCN_DEF set values for items
 KEYBLOC_PROG_CODE, KEYBLOC_ORGN_CODE, KEYBLOC_ACTV_CODE,
 KEYBLOC_LOCN_CODE.

 Created block level trigger FILL_DESC which is called from 
 item level trigger WHEN_VALIDATE_ITEM for both items 
 KEYBLOC_ACCI_CODE and KEYBLOC_FUND_CODE. The purpose of this
 is to fill-in description along with default codes. 

AUDIT TRAIL END
*/
BEGIN
 NULL;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: AUDIT_TRAIL_5_0

/*
AUDIT TRAIL: 5.0 
1. Defect............40311
 Signoff...........Tatyana Ispas 08/14/2000
 Problem...........Instead of doing a rollback to pull another orgn,
 used Remove record and in the process,
 deleting a line which displays an account.
 Exited the screen an tried to view the same record
 but was not able to retrieve the account. Went into FTNACCT
 and discovered the account is completely gone, no trace missing.
 Fix...............Created Key-delrec trigger on FTVACCT_BLOCK block to prevent deletion
 and receive a message 'You cannot delete record here'.
2. Defect...... 49159 Hanh Tran 13-Nov-2000
 Problem..... Balances are still displayed if user id do not have fund/org security
 and fund/org is null
 Fix......... Check fund/org security at next block, because post change
 will not fire if nothing is entered in fund/org field.
 Additional Modification: Change FTVFSYR record group to include Fiscal Years 
 which have no open periods 
3. Defect......12287 Hanh Tran 13-Nov-2000
 Problem.....Unable to check both the Query specific account and
 Include Revenue boxes at the same time. They act like
 radial buttons(either/or, not both) than check boxes.
 The Include Revenue box should be defaulted as always
 checked.
 Fix.........In triggers when-checkbox-changes on items Query_Acct
 and Incl_Rev, commented out the following line of code: 
 Execute_trigger('check_query_rev_acct');
 Changed the default value in the property sheet of item
 Incl_Rev to Y.
Audit Trail End 
Audit Trail end; 
*/ 
BEGIN
NULL;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: AUDIT_TRAIL_6_0

PROCEDURE AUDIT_TRAIL_6_0 IS
/*AUDIT TRAIL: 6.0
1. Defect......#41307
 Signoff.....Galina Andronov 01/28/2003
 Problem.....The user reports that after using the form for a while it starts returning incorrect data and eventually
 stops returning any data at all. Regardless of whether the data seems to be correct, there is always a 
 message at the bottom of the form: "FRM-40350: Query caused no records to be retrieved." At some point,
 this message starts appearing in a dialog box, followed by a second dialog box with a message about 
 'unable to insert record...', when these dialog boxes appear, the form doesn't return any data. Exiting 
 banner and restarting seems to correct the problem, albeit temporarily.
 Fix.........Modified KEY-EXIT trigger on form level and INSERT.....HIER triggers on form level. Modified KEY-CLRFRM 
 on form level. Modified LOAD_FORM_HEADER trigger on form level to bring Index from the global, and 
 WHEN_NEW_BLOCK_INSTANSE_TRG to cleas :GLOBAL.ACCI_CODE if Index is NULL. 
AUDIT TRAIL END */
BEGIN
 NULL;
END;

PROCEDURE AUDIT_TRAIL_8_4 IS
/* 
 Audit Trail: 8.4
 1. Defect......1-39D6DE
 Signoff.....Gopinath Thulasidoss 14-AUG-2009
 Problem.....FGIBDSR not displaying acct type due to atyp change. 
 Amounts not included in total.
 Fix.........Modified the datatype of item :KEYBLOC_SYSDATE from date 
 to datetime and removed the subclass as its only a non database
 and not displayed item. Changes similar to FGRBDST. 
 Also modified the where clause in the property pallette of 
 block FTVACCT_BLOCK to change the sysdate to KEYBLOC_SYSDATE. 
 
 2. Defect.....1-2IN90H
 Signoff....Gopinath Thulasidoss
 Problem....On FGIBDSR the Extract Data with Key is greyed out. 
 Fix........Changed the key block name from FGRFPHC to KEY_BLOCK. And also 
 subclassed the block to key-block class - G$_KEY_BLOCK_CLASS. 
 Changed the code where needed, from FGRFPHC to KEY_BLOCK in 
 KEY-EXIT, WHEN_NEW_BLOCK_INSTANCE_TRG, KEY-CLRFRM, POST-QUERY. 
 Audit Trail end; 
*/
BEGIN
 NULL;
END;

RecordGroup.Name: FTVFSYR_RG
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery: select ftvfsyr_coas_code,ftvfsyr_fsyr_code, to_char(ftvfsyr_start_date,G$_DATE.GET_NLS_DATE_FORMAT) ftvfsyr_start_date, to_char(ftvfsyr_end_date,G$_DATE.GET_NLS_DATE_FORMAT) ftvfsyr_end_date, y.ftvfspd_fspd_code, to_char(y.ftvfspd_prd_start_date,G$_DATE.GET_NLS_DATE_FORMAT) ftvfspd_prd_start_date, to_char(y.ftvfspd_prd_end_date,G$_DATE.GET_NLS_DATE_FORMAT) ftvfspd_prd_end_date, x.ftvfspd_fspd_code,ftvfsyr_eoy_accr_status_ind, to_char(ftvfsyr_activity_date,G$_DATE.GET_NLS_DATE_FORMAT) ftvfsyr_activity_date from ftvfsyr a,ftvfspd x,ftvfspd y where ftvfsyr_fsyr_code=x.ftvfspd_fsyr_code and ftvfsyr_fsyr_code=y.ftvfspd_fsyr_code and ftvfsyr_coas_code=x.ftvfspd_coas_code and ftvfsyr_coas_code=y.ftvfspd_coas_code and x.ftvfspd_fspd_code=(select min(ftvfspd_fspd_code) from ftvfspd b where a.ftvfsyr_fsyr_code=b.ftvfspd_fsyr_code and a.ftvfsyr_coas_code=b.ftvfspd_coas_code) and y.ftvfspd_fspd_code=(select max(ftvfspd_fspd_code) from ftvfspd c where a.ftvfsyr_fsyr_code=c.ftvfspd_fsyr_code and a.ftvfsyr_coas_code=c.ftvfspd_coas_code) order by decode(ftvfsyr_coas_code, :KEYBLOC_COAS_CODE, ' ', ftvfsyr_coas_code), fofycnv(ftvfsyr_fsyr_code)

Trigger.TriggerText:
/*BEGIN

 G$_CHECK_FAILURE;
END; */

 g$_CHECK_FAILURE;

 DECLARE 
 CURSOR GET_FGRFPHC IS
 SELECT 'X'
 FROM FGRFPHC
 WHERE FGRFPHC_SESS_ID = :FGRFPHC_SESS_ID
 AND FGRFPHC_FTYP_CODE = :FGRFPHC_FTYP_CODE
 AND FGRFPHC_LEVEL = :FGRFPHC_LEVEL 
 AND FGRFPHC_INTERNAL_FTYP_CODE = :FGRFPHC_INTERNAL_FTYP_CODE
 AND FGRFPHC_FTYP_LEVEL_1 = :FGRFPHC_FTYP_LEVEL_1; 
 TEMP_VAR VARCHAR2(1);
 BEGIN
 OPEN GET_FGRFPHC;
 FETCH GET_FGRFPHC INTO TEMP_VAR;
 IF GET_FGRFPHC%FOUND THEN
 :DEL_IND := 'Y';
 DELETE FROM FGRFPHC
 WHERE FGRFPHC_SESS_ID = :FGRFPHC_SESS_ID
 AND FGRFPHC_FTYP_CODE = :FGRFPHC_FTYP_CODE
 AND FGRFPHC_LEVEL = :FGRFPHC_LEVEL 
 AND FGRFPHC_INTERNAL_FTYP_CODE = :FGRFPHC_INTERNAL_FTYP_CODE
 AND FGRFPHC_FTYP_LEVEL_1 = :FGRFPHC_FTYP_LEVEL_1;
 -- GO_BLOCK( 'FGRFPHC' ) ;
 -- DELETE_RECORD ;
 DELETE FROM FGRORHC
 WHERE FGRORHC_SESS_ID = USERENV('SESSIONID') ;
--
 DELETE FROM FGRFDHC
 WHERE FGRFDHC_SESS_ID = USERENV('SESSIONID') ;
--
 DELETE FROM FGRATHC
 WHERE FGRATHC_SESS_ID = USERENV('SESSIONID') ;
--
 DELETE FROM FGRPGHC
 WHERE FGRPGHC_SESS_ID = USERENV('SESSIONID') ;
--
 DELETE FROM FGRLOHC
 WHERE FGRLOHC_SESS_ID = USERENV('SESSIONID') ;

 :system.message_level := '5' ;
 COMMIT_FORM ;
 :system.message_level := '0' ;
 ELSE
 IF :SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK = 'KEY_BLOCK' THEN /* 1-2IN90H */
 EXIT_FORM(NO_VALIDATE);
 END IF;
 END IF; 
 END;
 G$_GOQOLIB_KEY_TRIGGER.B2K_EXIT_FORM;

Trigger.Name: FOPAL_ENTER_ON_OFF
Trigger.Comment:
Created by Michael Hitrik 08/17/95

Purpose: Redefault Logic
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 
 curr_field_acci VARCHAR2(17);
 curr_field_fund VARCHAR2(17);
 curr_field_orgn VARCHAR2(17);
 curr_field_acct VARCHAR2(17);
 curr_field_prog VARCHAR2(17);
 curr_field_actv VARCHAR2(17);
 curr_field_locn VARCHAR2(17);

 fund_override varchar2(1); 
 orgn_override varchar2(1); 
 acct_override varchar2(1); 
 prog_override varchar2(1); 
 actv_override varchar2(1); 
 locn_override varchar2(1); 
 mess varchar2(50); 
 
BEGIN

 ffkfoap.p_edit_acci_code( 
 to_char(:keybloc_sysdate,'yyyymmddhh24miss'), 
 :keybloc_acci_code,
 :keybloc_coas_code, 
 :keybloc_fund_code, 
 :keybloc_orgn_code, 
 :keybloc_acct_code, 
 :keybloc_prog_code, 
 :keybloc_actv_code, 
 :keybloc_locn_code, 
 fund_override, 
 orgn_override, 
 acct_override, 
 prog_override, 
 actv_override, 
 locn_override,
 mess ); 
 
 curr_field_acci:='keybloc_ACCI_CODE';
 curr_field_fund:='keybloc_FUND_CODE';
 curr_field_orgn:='keybloc_ORGN_CODE';
 curr_field_acct:='keybloc_ACCT_CODE';
 curr_field_prog:='keybloc_PROG_CODE';
 curr_field_actv:='keybloc_ACTV_CODE';
 curr_field_locn:='keybloc_LOCN_CODE';
 
 
 IF NAME_IN(curr_field_acci) IS NOT NULL THEN

 IF FUND_OVERRIDE = 'N' THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY(curr_field_fund,UPDATEABLE,PROPERTY_OFF);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY(curr_field_fund,INSERT_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_OFF); 
 ELSIF (FUND_OVERRIDE = 'Y' OR FUND_OVERRIDE IS NULL) THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY(curr_field_fund,UPDATEABLE,PROPERTY_ON);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY(curr_field_fund,INSERT_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_ON);
 END IF;
 
 IF ORGN_OVERRIDE = 'N' THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY(curr_field_orgn,UPDATEABLE,PROPERTY_OFF);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY(curr_field_orgn,INSERT_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_OFF);
 ELSIF (ORGN_OVERRIDE = 'Y' OR ORGN_OVERRIDE IS NULL) THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY(curr_field_orgn,UPDATEABLE,PROPERTY_ON);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY(curr_field_orgn,INSERT_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_ON);
 END IF;

 IF ACCT_OVERRIDE = 'N' THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY(curr_field_acct,UPDATEABLE,PROPERTY_OFF);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY(curr_field_acct,INSERT_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_OFF);
 ELSIF (ACCT_OVERRIDE = 'Y' OR ACCT_OVERRIDE IS NULL) THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY(curr_field_acct,UPDATEABLE,PROPERTY_ON);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY(curr_field_acct,INSERT_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_ON);
 END IF;

 IF PROG_OVERRIDE = 'N' THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY(curr_field_prog,UPDATEABLE,PROPERTY_OFF);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY(curr_field_prog,INSERT_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_OFF);
 ELSIF (PROG_OVERRIDE = 'Y' OR PROG_OVERRIDE IS NULL) THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY(curr_field_prog,UPDATEABLE,PROPERTY_ON);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY(curr_field_prog,INSERT_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_ON);
 END IF;

 IF ACTV_OVERRIDE = 'N' THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY(curr_field_actv,UPDATEABLE,PROPERTY_OFF);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY(curr_field_actv,INSERT_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_OFF); 
 ELSIF (ACTV_OVERRIDE = 'Y' OR ACTV_OVERRIDE IS NULL) THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY(curr_field_actv,UPDATEABLE,PROPERTY_ON);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY(curr_field_actv,INSERT_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_ON);
 END IF;

 IF LOCN_OVERRIDE = 'N' THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY(curr_field_locn,UPDATEABLE,PROPERTY_OFF);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY(curr_field_locn,INSERT_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_OFF); 
 ELSIF (LOCN_OVERRIDE = 'Y' OR LOCN_OVERRIDE IS NULL) THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY(curr_field_locn,UPDATEABLE,PROPERTY_ON);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY(curr_field_locn,INSERT_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_ON);
 END IF;

 ELSE

 IF NAME_IN(curr_field_acci) IS NULL THEN
 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY(curr_field_fund,UPDATEABLE,PROPERTY_ON);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY(curr_field_orgn,UPDATEABLE,PROPERTY_ON);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY(curr_field_acct,UPDATEABLE,PROPERTY_ON);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY(curr_field_prog,UPDATEABLE,PROPERTY_ON);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY(curr_field_actv,UPDATEABLE,PROPERTY_ON);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY(curr_field_locn,UPDATEABLE,PROPERTY_ON);

 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY(curr_field_fund,INSERT_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_ON);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY(curr_field_orgn,INSERT_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_ON);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY(curr_field_acct,INSERT_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_ON);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY(curr_field_prog,INSERT_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_ON);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY(curr_field_actv,INSERT_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_ON);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY(curr_field_locn,INSERT_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_ON);

 END IF;
 END IF;
 END;

Trigger.Name: WHEN_NEW_BLOCK_INSTANCE_TRG
Trigger.TriggerText:
if :check_keys = 'Y' then 
 
 :check_keys := 'N';
 go_block('KEY_BLOCK'); /* 1-2IN90H */
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'CHECK_FUND_SECURITY' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
--
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'CHECK_ORGN_SECURITY' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
--
 IF :KEYBLOC_COAS_CODE IS NULL THEN
 MESSAGE(
 G$_NLS.Get('FGIBDSR-0000', 'FORM','Both Chart of Accounts and Fiscal Year required to perform query.') ) ;
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE ;
 END IF ;
 IF :KEYBLOC_FSYR_CODE IS NULL THEN
 MESSAGE(
 G$_NLS.Get('FGIBDSR-0001', 'FORM','Both Chart of Accounts and Fiscal Year required to perform query.') ) ;
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE ;
 END IF ;
--
 IF :keybloc_atyp_code IS NOT NULL THEN
 :query_acct := 'S' ;
 END IF ;
--
 IF :keybloc_acct_code IS NOT NULL THEN
 IF :keybloc_atyp_code IS NOT NULL THEN
 MESSAGE(
 G$_NLS.Get('FGIBDSR-0002', 'FORM','Both Account Code and Account Type may not be queried together.') ) ;
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE ;
 END IF ;
 END IF ;
--
 IF :QUERY_ACCT = 'S' THEN
 IF :KEYBLOC_ACCT_CODE IS NULL THEN
 IF :keybloc_atyp_code IS NULL THEN
 
 message( G$_NLS.Get('FGIBDSR-0003', 'FORM','When Query Specific Acct has been Checked, an acct code or acct type must be entered.') 
 
 );
raise form_trigger_failure;
 END IF ;
 END IF ;
 END IF ;
--
 << OK >>
 IF :KEYBLOC_ORGN_CODE IS NULL THEN
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'KEY_ORGN_DESC_NULL' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 END IF ;
 IF :KEYBLOC_FUND_CODE IS NULL THEN
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'KEY_FUND_DESC_NULL' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 END IF ;
 IF :KEYBLOC_PROG_CODE IS NULL THEN
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'KEY_PROG_DESC_NULL' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 END IF ;
 IF :KEYBLOC_ACCT_CODE IS NULL THEN
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'KEY_ACCT_DESC_NULL' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 END IF ;
 IF :KEYBLOC_ACTV_CODE IS NULL THEN
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'KEY_ACTV_DESC_NULL' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 END IF ;
 IF :KEYBLOC_LOCN_CODE IS NULL THEN
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'KEY_LOCN_DESC_NULL' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 END IF ;
 IF :KEYBLOC_atyp_CODE IS NULL THEN
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'KEY_atyp_DESC_NULL' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 END IF ;
--
 << OK1 >>
 
 :CMT_TYPE := :KEYBLOC_CMT_TYPE ;
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'FORCE_COMMIT' );
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE;
 NEXT_BLOCK ;
 EXECUTE_QUERY ;
 LAST_RECORD;
 FIRST_RECORD;
 
 :check_keys := 'N'; 
 execute_trigger('disable_keys');
 g$_CHECK_FAILURE;
end if;

IF :KEYBLOC_FUND_CODE IS NULL THEN
 :global.fund_code := :keybloc_fund_code;
 :key_fund_desc := '';
END IF ;
IF :KEYBLOC_ATYP_CODE IS NULL THEN
 :GLOBAL.ATYP_CODE := NULL;
 :GLOBAL.FTVATYP_CODE := NULL;
END IF;
IF :KEYBLOC_ACCI_CODE IS NULL THEN
 :GLOBAL.ACCI_CODE := NULL;
END IF;

Trigger.Name: INSERT_PROG_HIER
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF NVL(:DEL_IND, 'N') = 'Y' THEN
 RETURN;
END IF;
DECLARE
 CURSOR GET_FGRPGHC_REC IS
 SELECT 'X'
 FROM FGRPGHC
 WHERE FGRPGHC_SESS_ID = :FGRFPHC_SESS_ID
 AND FGRPGHC_PROG_CODE = :KEYBLOC_PROG_CODE;
 TEMP_VAR_P VARCHAR2(1);
BEGIN
 OPEN GET_FGRPGHC_REC;
 FETCH GET_FGRPGHC_REC INTO TEMP_VAR_P;
 IF GET_FGRPGHC_REC%NOTFOUND THEN 
 
 INSERT INTO fgrpghc
 ( fgrpghc_sess_id, fgrpghc_prog_code, fgrpghc_level,
 fgrpghc_prog_level_1 )
 SELECT USERENV('sessionid'), ftvprog_prog_code, LEVEL, LEVEL
 FROM ftvprog
 CONNECT BY PRIOR ftvprog_prog_code = ftvprog_prog_code_pred
 AND PRIOR ftvprog_coas_code = ftvprog_coas_code
 AND ftvprog_eff_date <= :KEYBLOC_SYSDATE
 AND ftvprog_nchg_date > :KEYBLOC_SYSDATE
 START WITH ftvprog_prog_code = :KEYBLOC_PROG_CODE
 AND ftvprog_coas_code = :KEYBLOC_COAS_CODE
 AND ftvprog_eff_date <= :KEYBLOC_SYSDATE
 AND ftvprog_nchg_date > :KEYBLOC_SYSDATE ;
 END IF;
 CLOSE GET_FGRPGHC_REC;
END;

Trigger.TriggerText:
IF NVL(:DEL_IND, 'N') = 'Y' THEN

 CONNECT BY PRIOR ftvorgn_orgn_code = ftvorgn_orgn_code_pred
 AND PRIOR ftvorgn_coas_code = ftvorgn_coas_code
 AND ftvorgn_eff_date <= :KEYBLOC_SYSDATE

Trigger.Name: INSERT_FUND_HIER
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF NVL(:DEL_IND, 'N') = 'Y' THEN
 RETURN;
END IF;
DECLARE
 CURSOR GET_FGRFDHC_REC IS
 SELECT 'X'
 FROM FGRFDHC, FTVFUND
 WHERE FGRFDHC_SESS_ID = :FGRFPHC_SESS_ID
 AND FGRFDHC_FUND_CODE = :KEYBLOC_FUND_CODE
 AND FGRFDHC_FTYP_CODE = FTVFUND_FTYP_CODE
 AND FGRFDHC_INTERNAL_FTYP_CODE = 20
 AND FTVFUND_COAS_CODE = :KEYBLOC_COAS_CODE
 AND FTVFUND_FUND_CODE = FGRFDHC_FUND_CODE
 AND FTVFUND_EFF_DATE <= :KEYBLOC_SYSDATE
 AND FTVFUND_NCHG_DATE > :KEYBLOC_SYSDATE;
 TEMP_VAR_F VARCHAR2(1);
BEGIN
 OPEN GET_FGRFDHC_REC;
 FETCH GET_FGRFDHC_REC INTO TEMP_VAR_F;
 IF GET_FGRFDHC_REC%NOTFOUND THEN
 INSERT INTO fgrfdhc
 ( fgrfdhc_sess_id, fgrfdhc_fund_code, fgrfdhc_level,
 fgrfdhc_ftyp_code, fgrfdhc_fund_level_1,
 fgrfdhc_internal_ftyp_code )
 SELECT USERENV('sessionid'), ftvfund_fund_code, LEVEL,
 ftvfund_ftyp_code, LEVEL, '20'
 FROM ftvfund
 CONNECT BY PRIOR ftvfund_coas_code = ftvfund_coas_code
 AND PRIOR ftvfund_fund_code = ftvfund_fund_code_pred
 AND ftvfund_eff_date <= :KEYBLOC_SYSDATE
 AND ftvfund_nchg_date > :KEYBLOC_SYSDATE
 START WITH ftvfund_coas_code = :KEYBLOC_COAS_CODE
 AND ftvfund_fund_code = :KEYBLOC_FUND_CODE
 AND ftvfund_eff_date <= :KEYBLOC_SYSDATE
 AND ftvfund_nchg_date > :KEYBLOC_SYSDATE ;
 END IF;
 CLOSE GET_FGRFDHC_REC;
END;

Trigger.Name: INSERT_ATYP_HIER
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF NVL(:DEL_IND, 'N') = 'Y' THEN
 RETURN;
END IF;
 INSERT INTO fgrathc
 ( fgrathc_sess_id, fgrathc_acct_code, fgrathc_level,
 fgrathc_atyp_code, fgrathc_internal_atyp_code,
 fgrathc_acct_level_1 )
 SELECT USERENV('sessionid'), ftvacct_acct_code, '0',
 -- LEVEL,
 ftvacct_atyp_code, '10', '0'
 -- LEVEL
 FROM ftvacct a
 WHERE a.ftvacct_coas_code = :keybloc_coas_code
 AND a.ftvacct_eff_date <= :KEYBLOC_SYSDATE
 AND a.ftvacct_nchg_date > :KEYBLOC_SYSDATE
 AND EXISTS (
 SELECT 'X'
 FROM ftvatyp
 WHERE ftvatyp_coas_code = :KEYBLOC_COAS_CODE
 AND ftvatyp_atyp_code = a.ftvacct_atyp_code
 AND (ftvatyp_atyp_code_pred = :keybloc_atyp_code
 OR ftvatyp_atyp_code = :keybloc_atyp_code)
 AND ftvatyp_eff_date <= :KEYBLOC_SYSDATE
 AND ftvatyp_nchg_date > :KEYBLOC_SYSDATE ) ;

Trigger.Name: INSERT_ACCT_HIER
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF NVL(:DEL_IND, 'N') = 'Y' THEN
 RETURN;
END IF;
DECLARE
 CURSOR GET_FGRATHC_REC IS
 SELECT 'X'
 FROM FGRATHC, FTVACCT
 WHERE FGRATHC_SESS_ID = :FGRFPHC_SESS_ID
 AND FGRATHC_ACCT_CODE = :KEYBLOC_ACCT_CODE
 AND FGRATHC_ATYP_CODE = FTVACCT_ATYP_CODE
 AND FGRATHC_INTERNAL_ATYP_CODE = 10
 AND FTVACCT_COAS_CODE = :KEYBLOC_COAS_CODE
 AND FTVACCT_ACCT_CODE = FGRATHC_ACCT_CODE
 AND FTVACCT_EFF_DATE <= :KEYBLOC_SYSDATE
 AND FTVACCT_NCHG_DATE > :KEYBLOC_SYSDATE;
 TEMP_VAR_A VARCHAR2(1);
BEGIN
 OPEN GET_FGRATHC_REC;
 FETCH GET_FGRATHC_REC INTO TEMP_VAR_A;
 IF GET_FGRATHC_REC%NOTFOUND THEN
 INSERT INTO fgrathc
 ( fgrathc_sess_id, fgrathc_acct_code, fgrathc_level,
 fgrathc_atyp_code, fgrathc_internal_atyp_code,
 fgrathc_acct_level_1 )
 SELECT USERENV('sessionid'), ftvacct_acct_code, LEVEL,
 ftvacct_atyp_code, '10', LEVEL
 FROM ftvacct
 CONNECT BY PRIOR ftvacct_coas_code = ftvacct_coas_code
 AND PRIOR ftvacct_acct_code = ftvacct_acct_code_pred
 AND ftvacct_eff_date <= :KEYBLOC_SYSDATE
 AND ftvacct_nchg_date > :KEYBLOC_SYSDATE
 START WITH ftvacct_coas_code = :KEYBLOC_COAS_CODE
 AND ftvacct_acct_code = :KEYBLOC_ACCT_CODE
 AND ftvacct_eff_date <= :KEYBLOC_SYSDATE
 AND ftvacct_nchg_date > :KEYBLOC_SYSDATE ;
 END IF;
 CLOSE GET_FGRATHC_REC;
END;

Trigger.Name: CHECK_ORGN_SECURITY
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :GLOBAL.FUND_ORG_SECURITY_IND = 'Y' THEN
 NULL ;
 ELSIF :GLOBAL.FUND_ORG_SECURITY_IND = 'N' THEN
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'TRG_FAIL' ) ;
 IF NOT FORM_SUCCESS THEN
 GOTO TRIG_EXIT ;
 END IF ;
 END IF ;
--
 << CHECK_PROF >>
 IF ( :GLOBAL.QUERY_MODE = '1' ) THEN
 GOTO TRIG_EXIT ;
 END IF ;
 DECLARE
 PTI_INTO_TEMP VARCHAR2(255);
 CURSOR PTI_CURSOR IS
 SELECT 'Y'
 FROM FOBPROF
 WHERE FOBPROF_USER_ID = :CURRENT_USER
 AND FOBPROF_MASTER_ORGN_IND IN ('B', 'Q') ;
 BEGIN
 OPEN PTI_CURSOR ;
 FETCH PTI_CURSOR INTO PTI_INTO_TEMP ;
 IF PTI_CURSOR%NOTFOUND THEN
 GOTO CHECK_NULL_ORGN ;
 ELSE
 GOTO TRIG_EXIT ;
 END IF ;
 END ;
--
 << CHECK_NULL_ORGN >>
 IF :KEYBLOC_ORGN_CODE is null then
 MESSAGE(
 G$_NLS.Get('FGIBDSR-0005', 'FORM','User must have Master Organization capabilities to have Organization null.') 
 ) ;
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE ;
 ELSE GOTO DO_SECURITY ;
 END IF ;
--
 << DO_SECURITY >>
 DECLARE
 CURSOR PTI_CURSOR IS
 SELECT FTVORGN_ORGN_CODE
 FROM FTVORGN a
 WHERE EXISTS (
 SELECT 'X'
 FROM FORUSOR
 WHERE FORUSOR_USER_ID_ENTERED = :CURRENT_USER
 AND FORUSOR_COAS_CODE = a.ftvorgn_COAS_CODE
 AND forusor_orgn_code = a.ftvorgn_orgn_code )
 CONNECT BY FTVORGN_COAS_CODE = PRIOR FTVORGN_COAS_CODE
 AND FTVORGN_ORGN_CODE = PRIOR FTVORGN_ORGN_CODE_PRED
 AND FTVORGN_EFF_DATE <= SYSDATE
 AND FTVORGN_NCHG_DATE > SYSDATE
 START WITH FTVORGN_COAS_CODE = :KEYBLOC_COAS_CODE
 AND FTVORGN_ORGN_CODE = :KEYBLOC_ORGN_CODE
 AND FTVORGN_EFF_DATE <= SYSDATE
 AND FTVORGN_NCHG_DATE > SYSDATE ;
 BEGIN
 OPEN PTI_CURSOR ;
 FETCH PTI_CURSOR INTO :RETRIEVED_ORGN_CODE ;
 IF PTI_CURSOR%NOTFOUND THEN
 GOTO ORGN_NOT_ALLOWED ;
 END IF ;
 END ;
--
 << CHK_ORGN_ALLOWED >>
 IF ( :GLOBAL.QUERY_MODE = '1' ) THEN
 GOTO TRIG_EXIT ;
 END IF ;
 DECLARE
 PTI_INTO_TEMP VARCHAR2(255);
 CURSOR PTI_CURSOR IS
 SELECT 'Y'
 FROM FORUSOR
 WHERE FORUSOR_USER_ID_ENTERED = :CURRENT_USER
 AND FORUSOR_COAS_CODE = :KEYBLOC_COAS_CODE
 AND FORUSOR_ORGN_CODE = :RETRIEVED_ORGN_CODE
 AND FORUSOR_ACCESS_IND IN ('B', 'Q') ;
 BEGIN
 OPEN PTI_CURSOR ;
 FETCH PTI_CURSOR INTO PTI_INTO_TEMP ;
 IF PTI_CURSOR%NOTFOUND THEN
 GOTO ORGN_NOT_ALLOWED ;
 ELSE
 GOTO TRIG_EXIT ;
 END IF ;
 END ;
--
 << ORGN_NOT_ALLOWED >>
 MESSAGE(
 G$_NLS.Get('FGIBDSR-0006', 'FORM','User is not authorized to query with the entered Organization.') )
 ;
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE ;
--
 << TRIG_EXIT >>
 NULL ;

Trigger.Name: CHECK_FUND_SECURITY
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :GLOBAL.FUND_ORG_SECURITY_IND = 'N' THEN
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'TRG_FAIL' ) ;
 IF NOT FORM_SUCCESS THEN
 GOTO TRIG_EXIT ;
 END IF ;
 ELSIF :GLOBAL.FUND_ORG_SECURITY_IND = 'Y' THEN
 NULL ;
 END IF ;
--
 << CHECK_PROF >>
 IF ( :GLOBAL.QUERY_MODE = '1' ) THEN
 GOTO TRIG_EXIT ;
 END IF ;
 DECLARE
 PTI_INTO_TEMP VARCHAR2(255);
 CURSOR PTI_CURSOR IS
 SELECT 'Y'
 FROM FOBPROF
 WHERE FOBPROF_USER_ID = :CURRENT_USER
 AND FOBPROF_MASTER_FUND_IND IN ('B', 'Q') ;
 BEGIN
 OPEN PTI_CURSOR ;
 FETCH PTI_CURSOR INTO PTI_INTO_TEMP ;
 IF PTI_CURSOR%NOTFOUND THEN
 GOTO CHECK_NULL_FUND ;
 ELSE
 GOTO TRIG_EXIT ;
 END IF ;
 END ;
--
 << CHECK_NULL_FUND >>
 IF :KEYBLOC_FUND_CODE is null then
 MESSAGE(
 G$_NLS.Get('FGIBDSR-0007', 'FORM','User must have Master Fund capabilities to have Fund null.') ) ;
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE ;
 ELSE GOTO DO_SECURITY ;
 END IF ;
--
 << DO_SECURITY >>
 DECLARE
 CURSOR PTI_CURSOR IS
 SELECT FTVFUND_FUND_CODE
 FROM FTVFUND a
 WHERE EXISTS (
 SELECT 'X'
 FROM FORUSFN
 WHERE FORUSFN_USER_ID_ENTERED = :CURRENT_USER
 AND FORUSFN_COAS_CODE = a.ftvfund_COAS_CODE
 AND FORUSFN_FUND_CODE = a.ftvfund_fund_code )
 CONNECT BY FTVFUND_COAS_CODE = PRIOR FTVFUND_COAS_CODE
 AND FTVFUND_FUND_CODE = PRIOR FTVFUND_FUND_CODE_PRED
 AND FTVFUND_EFF_DATE <= :KEYBLOC_SYSDATE
 AND FTVFUND_NCHG_DATE > :KEYBLOC_SYSDATE
 START WITH FTVFUND_COAS_CODE = :KEYBLOC_COAS_CODE
 AND FTVFUND_FUND_CODE = :KEYBLOC_FUND_CODE
 AND FTVFUND_EFF_DATE <= :KEYBLOC_SYSDATE
 AND FTVFUND_NCHG_DATE > :KEYBLOC_SYSDATE ;
 BEGIN
 OPEN PTI_CURSOR ;
 FETCH PTI_CURSOR INTO :RETRIEVED_FUND_CODE ;
 IF PTI_CURSOR%NOTFOUND THEN
 GOTO CHECK_FTYP ;
 END IF ;
 END ;
--
 << CHK_FUND_ALLOWED >>
 IF ( :GLOBAL.QUERY_MODE = '1' ) THEN
 GOTO TRIG_EXIT ;
 END IF ;
 DECLARE
 PTI_INTO_TEMP VARCHAR2(255);
 CURSOR PTI_CURSOR IS
 SELECT 'Y'
 FROM FORUSFN
 WHERE FORUSFN_USER_ID_ENTERED = :CURRENT_USER
 AND FORUSFN_COAS_CODE = :KEYBLOC_COAS_CODE
 AND FORUSFN_FUND_CODE = :RETRIEVED_FUND_CODE
 AND FORUSFN_ACCESS_IND IN ('B', 'Q') ;
 BEGIN
 OPEN PTI_CURSOR ;
 FETCH PTI_CURSOR INTO PTI_INTO_TEMP ;
 IF PTI_CURSOR%NOTFOUND THEN
 GOTO FUND_NOT_ALLOWED ;
 ELSE
 GOTO TRIG_EXIT ;
 END IF ;
 END ;
--
 << CHECK_FTYP >>
 DECLARE
 CURSOR PTI_CURSOR IS
 SELECT FTVFTYP_FTYP_CODE
 FROM FTVFTYP a
 WHERE EXISTS (
 SELECT 'X'
 FROM FORUSFN
 WHERE FORUSFN_USER_ID_ENTERED = :CURRENT_USER
 AND FORUSFN_COAS_CODE = a.ftvftyp_COAS_CODE
 AND FORUSFN_FTYP_CODE = a.ftvftyp_ftyp_code )
 CONNECT BY FTVFTYP_COAS_CODE = PRIOR FTVFTYP_COAS_CODE
 AND FTVFTYP_FTYP_CODE = PRIOR FTVFTYP_FTYP_CODE_PRED
 AND FTVFTYP_EFF_DATE <= :KEYBLOC_SYSDATE
 AND FTVFTYP_NCHG_DATE > :KEYBLOC_SYSDATE
 START WITH FTVFTYP_COAS_CODE = :KEYBLOC_COAS_CODE
 AND FTVFTYP_FTYP_CODE IN (
 SELECT FTVFUND_FTYP_CODE
 FROM FTVFUND
 WHERE FTVFUND_COAS_CODE = :KEYBLOC_COAS_CODE
 AND FTVFUND_FUND_CODE = :KEYBLOC_FUND_CODE
 AND FTVFUND_EFF_DATE < :KEYBLOC_SYSDATE
 AND FTVFUND_NCHG_DATE > :KEYBLOC_SYSDATE )
 AND FTVFTYP_EFF_DATE <= :KEYBLOC_SYSDATE
 AND FTVFTYP_NCHG_DATE > :KEYBLOC_SYSDATE ;
 BEGIN
 OPEN PTI_CURSOR ;
 FETCH PTI_CURSOR INTO :RETRIEVED_FTYP_CODE ;
 IF PTI_CURSOR%NOTFOUND THEN
 GOTO FUND_NOT_ALLOWED ;
 END IF ;
 END ;
--
 << CHK_FTYP_ALLOWED >>
 IF ( :GLOBAL.QUERY_MODE = '1' ) THEN
 GOTO TRIG_EXIT ;
 END IF ;
 DECLARE
 PTI_INTO_TEMP VARCHAR2(255);
 CURSOR PTI_CURSOR IS
 SELECT 'Y'
 FROM FORUSFN
 WHERE FORUSFN_USER_ID_ENTERED = :CURRENT_USER
 AND FORUSFN_COAS_CODE = :KEYBLOC_COAS_CODE
 AND FORUSFN_FTYP_CODE = :RETRIEVED_FTYP_CODE
 AND FORUSFN_ACCESS_IND IN ('B', 'Q') ;
 BEGIN
 OPEN PTI_CURSOR ;
 FETCH PTI_CURSOR INTO PTI_INTO_TEMP ;
 IF PTI_CURSOR%NOTFOUND THEN
 GOTO FUND_NOT_ALLOWED ;
 ELSE
 GOTO TRIG_EXIT ;
 END IF ;
 END ;
--
 << FUND_NOT_ALLOWED >>
 MESSAGE( G$_NLS.Get('FGIBDSR-0008', 'FORM','User is not authorized to query the entered Fund.') ) ;
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE ;
--
 << TRIG_EXIT >>
 NULL ;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-NEW-FORM-INSTANCE
Trigger.TriggerText:
G$_SET_INST_PROPERTY;
 G$_SET_WIN_PROPERTY;
 DEFAULT_VALUE( '', 'GLOBAL.FTVATYP_CODE' ) ;
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'LOAD_FORM_HEADER' ) ; 
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 
-- 
 IF :GLOBAL.FORM_WAS_CALLED = 'Y' THEN
 next_block;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 END IF ; 

EXECUTE_TRIGGER('FORM_FORMAT_NUMBERS');

Trigger.Name: KEY_EXIT_TRG
Trigger.TriggerText:
null;

Trigger.Name: KEY-CLRFRM
Trigger.TriggerText:
EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'SAVE_KEYS' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;

 CLEAR_BLOCK ;
 execute_trigger('clear_net_totals');
 g$_check_failure;

 execute_trigger('enable_keys');
 g$_check_failure;

 
 
 GO_BLOCK( 'KEY_BLOCK' ) ; /* 1-2IN90H */
 DELETE_RECORD ;
 :system.message_level := '5' ;
 COMMIT_FORM ;
 :system.message_level := '0' ;


 CLEAR_FORM ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;

 
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'load_clear_form' );
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;


 
 if :keybloc_coas_code is not null and
 :keybloc_fsyr_code is not null
 then
 go_item('keybloc_acci_code');
 end if;
